attributes.action: Inflict a greater jail sentence on the Mother and Stepfather of Baby Peter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Mother of Baby Peter has just been sentenced to five years in jail and his stepfather to twelve years for the murder of baby Peter.  This is an injustice and they deserve a far greater sentence.

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms), we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
